<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H1248|בַּר]]</big>**</small>
 I. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּר‎</span> **noun masculine** ==son== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Mandean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ברא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M § 148</sup>, Old Aramaic, Nabataean, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בר‎</span> (and <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בן‎</span>) [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>242 f.</sup>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בר‎</span> according to [[BDB#Mordt|Mordtm]]<sup>VOJ x. 154 f.</sup>; = <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּן‎</span>, = becoming <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ר‎</span>, Philippi<sup>ZMG xxxii (1878), 36 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Brock|Brock]]<sup>Syr. Gr. § 76</sup> and others; √ different from <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בן‎</span> according to [[BDB#JHMich|JHMich]] [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 63</sup> and others; Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּר‎</span> Aramaism for <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּן‎</span>); — construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ב‎</span> [[Dan.3.25|Dan 3:25]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּרֵהּ‎</span> [[Dan.5.22|Dan 5:22]] plural construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּנֵי‎</span> [[Ezra.6.9|Ezra 6:9]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּנ֫וֺהִי‎</span> [[Ezra.6.10|Ezra 6:10]]; [[Ezra.7.23|Ezra 7:23]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּנֵיהוֺן‎</span> [[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]] — 

**1.** ***son(s)*** [[Ezra.5.1|Ezra 5:1]]; [[Ezra.5.2|Ezra 5:2]] (twice in verse); [[Ezra.6.14|Ezra 6:14]]; [[Dan.5.22|Dan 5:22]]; [[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]]; [[Ezra.6.10|Ezra 6:10]]; [[Ezra.7.23|Ezra 7:23]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל‎</span> [[Ezra.6.16|Ezra 6:16]] = ***Israelites***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּנֵי גָלוּתָא‎</span> = ***captives*** v[[Ezra.6.16|Ezra 6:16]]; [[Dan.2.25|Dan 2:25]]; [[Dan.5.13|Dan 5:13]]; [[Dan.6.14|Dan 6:14]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּראֱֿנָשׁ‎</span> [[Dan.7.13|Dan 7:13]] i.e. ***one of human kind***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּנֵי אֲנָשָׁא‎</span> ***men*** [[Dan.2.38|Dan 2:38]]; [[Dan.5.21|Dan 5:21]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּראֱֿלָהִין‎</span> [[Dan.3.25|Dan 3:25]] ***a divine*** (or angelic) ***being*** (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]], and compare Biblical Hebrew [[Gen.6.2|Gen 6:2]]; [[Job.1.6|Job 1:6]]); <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּר שְׁנִין וגו‎</span> [[Job.6.1|Job 6:1]] ***a son of 62 years = 62 years old*** (Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּן‎</span> **9**). 

**2.** of bullocks, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּנֵי תוֺרִין‎</span> [[Ezra.6.9|Ezra 6:9]]. 

II. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּר‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ברר‎</span>.
